normalized_sections.ABOUT:
personnel security specialist
dedicated security specialist professional that possess and excutes a broad knowledge of division processes to include personnel security,
information security, physical security and industrial security. personable leader who comfortably interacts with people from diverse cultures
and backgrounds.

WORK EXPERIENCE.raw:
accomplishments
deployed in support of a joint special operations task force in the centcom area of responsibility (aor). provided full-spectrum security
support to include personnel security, information security, physical security and industrial security. worked with joint personnel from all
services, as well as other government agencies.
personnel security specialist 05/2014 to current company name city , state

personnel security specialist within a joint command dod regulation 5200.2-r, army regulation 380-67 and knowledgable of other dod and federal agencies personnel security program
